definition: fire and candles/household things that burn
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo
candle/(literary) to illuminate

sentences.english: We must keep the chemicals away from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須使這些化學品遠離火燭。

sentences.english: WE are always mindful of the danger of fire.
Are they civil servants, who shouted to notice people that the weather is day and be careful in candle and fire?
sentences.chinese: 半夜在街上喊天乾物燥小心火燭的更夫，算公務員嗎？

sentences.english: He is always careful with the fire .

to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
lantern/uncovered oil lamp

trade wind
altar lamp burning day and night

mushroom cloud

to be alarmed/to be terrified
